name: 6O²s
description:
You are a space thief who stole something and take a little spaceship to escape people who try to catch you, but you don't have enough supplies and you are lost in space.  You only have 60 seconds to hide at the next big station, or you'll miss O² so you will die.  Collect enough supplies to survive and go as fast as you can.

YOU CAN PLAY ONLY WITH CONTROLLER

OUR TEAM: 

Game developpers: Guillaume Aubineau, Mateo Alber Latour

Game Artists: Jean Tepedelen, Brian Mélard, Andrea Garcia

Concept artist: Lilou Caubert

Sound-design/Music : Brian Mélard
